title: First character lost, now constant log in probs.
body: Alright rito. so i had my first account somehow "lost" but yet still in the database. Tazville. i decided to chunk it to the game and move on to create a new account which is finally back to Silver II. I find it hard to continue playing when youve done nothing to recover said account, i constantly have trouble logging in due to failures on your end (sometimes 10 min sometimes cant log for over a week) and getting D/Cs when im about to hit promos. now since my buddy did a remake i get penalized, lose LP and possibly get a time ban. Ive spent hundreds on RP and yet i feel that money gets dicked around. do something about your servers guys. im tired of getting d/c's atleast once a week. ive played plenty of other games and never have i d/c'd until this oh so wonderful game you released. so if anyone has tips on how to stop these d/cs or even recover my account let me know. Mind you i already submitted a ticket for the account and i got told to "reset my password" which i couldnt do because i had to immediately create a new summoner name and start all over under the same email/password/account name.

replies.body: If you are still have issues recovering your old account, let us know by replying to your current ticket.  We'll be happy to look into it further with you!  The disconnection problems are usually due to a network issue failing to maintain a connection to the game server.  I suggest you follow each step in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to fix this up for good.  Hopefully, that gets you back in game without issue!
